name: RES_COMPONENTS_SNOMED
description: This table stores the SNOMED code for the component value or antibiotic received from the external system.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the result component in the result.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple SNOMED codes associated with the result and result component from the RES_COMPONENTS table.

columns.name: SNOMED_CODE
columns.description: The SNOMED code for the component value or antibiotic received from an external system.
